import React from 'react' import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from '../context/auth'; function Header() { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; return (
